content: > this pattern is available for **free** on > my website click the link above **skill level intermediate** hi everyone this christmas ornament is a matching piece to one of my most popular designs my christmas wreath ornament which i made a few years ago until now i am both astonished and grateful for all the attention that post has gained and so for this year i decided to come up with a new ornament inspired by it about this santa ornament i used a plastic ring that i purchased from a crafts store as a base to crochet santa faces around it in a circle you can swap for a bigger or smaller ring than the one i used easily and make as many faces as you want by allocating six double_crochet stitches in the first round for each face i hope you have fun with this quick and easy project check out my other christmas crochet patterns granny square wreath 1 christmas wreath ornament 2 christmas stocking granny square 3 christmas hat and tree 4 christmas cherry granny square 5 all about christmas scarf 6 **measurements ** * ornament diameter 4 10 cm * cord length 9 22 cm **materials** * suggested yarn d m c happy cotton 0 7 oz 20 g 47 yards 43 m in the following colors and quantities one red skein one white skein and one pink skein * crochet hook size us e-4 3 5 mm * one plastic ring 2 5 cm in diameter 1/4 0 7 cm thick * beads eight in red 0 25 0 6 cm in diameter and sixteen in black 0 2 0 5 cm in diameter * tapestry needle 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/granny-square-wreath 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/christmas-wreath-ornament-16 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/christmas-stocking-granny-square 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/christmas-hat-and-tree 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/christmas-cherry-granny-square 6 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-about-christmas-scarf
